name: I Stole a Wizard's Sack and All I Got Was This Lousy Infinite Pocket Universe
name_original: I Stole a Wizard's Sack and All I Got Was This Lousy Infinite Pocket Universe
description:
Ludum Dare 48 entry; a mind-warping puzzle game featuring recursion, non-euclidean levels, and other brain ticklers!

Controls
  • WASD / Arrow Keys : movement
  • Q : pick up item (keys and bags)
  • E : interact with something (keep in mind you can't go up ropes while holding something)
  • R : reset the level
Hints

Feeling stuck? Check the submission page comments for hints! If the hint you need isn't there, just write a comment below and ask!
